item.name: Green Crystal
item.desc: A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Heating Rough Green Crystals found near Rhutum Outstation.

item.name: Dwarf Mushroom
item.desc:
A natural resource obtained through Gathering that can be used as an ingredient in Alchemy and Cooking.
- How to Obtain: It can be Produced at Northern Cienaga. Dwarf Mushrooms can be Gathered using Bare Hands or a Hoe.

 ※ Consuming this item without Cooking will grant a special buff, but you may be poisoned!
